headline: LEYBOLD ROTARY VANE PUMP 53.7 CFM
description: Two Stage Rotary Vane Pump          Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.    Leybold D90AC
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model D90AC
Pumping Speed 53.7 CFM (1,517.4 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 9.00E-4(En) torr (1.20E-3 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Refurbished YES
Two-Stage YES
Gas Ballast Yes
Direct Drive Yes
Motor Horsepower 3 HP
Rotational Speed 1,725 RPM
Oil Capacity Minimum: 3.79 L (4.00 qt, 0.83 Br gal)
Power Requirements 230/460 V 9.0 A 60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Depth 33.000 in (83.8 cm)
Height 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
Weight 215 lb (98 kg)
